mainText:
I'm 38 and I'm based in Amsterdam, The Netherlands.

I was 13 when I first worked with an Apple macintosh.
I designed pages for a magazine and printed out sheets of text,
which I placed on papergrids for the printer.

Now I work at a printshop and design websites.
I still work on an Apple.

Steve,
thank you for giving me these tools,
so I can make a living for myself,
my partner and my kids.
author: Jasmine
